description: This file implements the core functions for a request controller object in a broad management system, including creation, initialization, object enrollment, removal, and related methods. It establishes the object lifecycle and interface functions for controlling and managing requests within the system.

classes.name: BMC2_REQ_CONTROLLER_OBJECT
classes.description: The primary object representing a request controller, encapsulating its state, interface functions, locks, and associated data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE Bmc2ReqcoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the Bmc2 Request Controller object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ReqcoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the given request controller object and releases allocated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ReqcoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enlists necessary subordinate objects and interfaces required by the controller object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ReqcoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs detailed initialization of the controller object's member fields and interface functions.
